about_the_game:
This DLC is just one single JPEG image of the developer drinking coffee, the same as you see in the screenshot above. When purchased, it will be downloaded directly to your game's directory.



You are welcome to move the file, but please do not make any copies of it or upload it to social media. If you would like to have another copy, please purchase another DLC.
